mention.text: Masire and Dr. Bernard Ledea Ouedraogo
the 1988 Africa Prize for Leadership for their efforts in averting hunger
500,000 peasants in nine countries in Africa
The villagers in Burkina Faso , Chad , Gambia , Guinea-Bissau , Mali , Mauritania , Niger , Senegal and Togo
